The 'complement' of a strand of DNA is what the opposing strand looks like. (Replace A with T, T with A, G with C, and C with G). For example: the complement of ATCGA is TAGCT. Find the complement to the sequence provided

The 'reverse complement' of DNA is the complement (see above) of a strand that is also reversed. Example: ATCGGG has a reverse complement of CCCGAT. Find the reverse complement of the string!
